description: Morecambe make their second January signing as they bring in ex-Hartlepool United midfielder Callum Cooke.
title: Morecambe: Shrimps bring in ex-Hartlepool midfielder Callum Cooke
title_page: Morecambe: Shrimps bring in ex-Hartlepool midfielder Callum Cooke - BBC Sport
maintext:
Morecambe have signed midfielder Callum Cooke on a deal until the end of the season.
Cooke was a free agent having left National League Hartlepool United at the end of last season.
The 27-year-old links up with Morecambe boss Derek Adams, having played under the Scot at Bradford City.
"The gaffer gives you a license to go and express yourself, especially in the final third and being an attacking midfielder, having that is vital," Cooke told the Shrimps' official website, external.
